name: fs-ai-tools
description: A bag of tools to clean flightplans and .cfg files

fs-ai-tools.aircraftcfgRemoveUnusedLines.title: Aircraft.cfg: Remove unused lines
fs-ai-tools.aircraftcfgRemoveUnusedLines.markdownDescription: Removes the `atc_id=…`, `atc_id_color=…`, `atc_flight_number=…`, `atc_heavy=0` and `visual_damage=…` lines from the fltsim entries.

fs-ai-tools.aircraftcfgRenumber.title: Aircraft.cfg: Renumber
fs-ai-tools.aircraftcfgRenumber.markdownDescription: Renumbers the `fltsim` entries in sequence, starting at `0`.

fs-ai-tools.aircraftcfgTrimEmptyLines.title: Aircraft.cfg: Trim Empty Lines
fs-ai-tools.aircraftcfgTrimEmptyLines.markdownDescription: Removes multiple empty lines between `fltsim` entries and leaves a single one.

fs-ai-tools.flightplansLeadingZeroesFlig.title: Flightplans: Leading zeroes flightnumbers
fs-ai-tools.flightplansLeadingZeroesFlig.markdownDescription: Pads the flightnumbers to 4 digits with zeroes (e.g. `12` becomes `0012`).

fs-ai-tools.flightplansLeadingZeroesFlig.title: Flightplans: Leading zeroes flight levels
fs-ai-tools.flightplansLeadingZeroesFlig.markdownDescription: Pads the flight levels to 3 digits with zeroes (e.g. `70` becomes `070`).

fs-ai-tools.flightplansRemoveSeconds.title: Flightplans: Remove seconds
fs-ai-tools.flightplansRemoveSeconds.markdownDescription: Removes seconds from arrival and departure times (e.g. `12:34:56` becomes `12:34`).

fs-ai-tools.flightplansRandomPercentage.title: Flightplans: Randomize percentages
fs-ai-tools.flightplansRandomPercentage.markdownDescription: Randomizes the flightplans' percentages to values between the `min` and `max` set.

fs-ai-tools.flightplansRandomPercentageM.title: Flightplans: Randomize percentage min
fs-ai-tools.flightplansRandomPercentageM.markdownDescription: If `Randomize percentages` is activated, this will be the min value.

fs-ai-tools.flightplansRandomPercentageM.title: Flightplans: Randomize percentage max
fs-ai-tools.flightplansRandomPercentageM.markdownDescription: If `Randomize percentages` is activated, this will be the max value.
